Summary: You tube video no one caught before
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sukaraja
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi am at work, every day i go on youtube to check for ufo videos today there was a new post, it is a video of an erupting volcano in sakurajima, in the video there are some objects moving and flashing etc the video sourse is the panoramic camaras at the site by the volcano. the person that posted the video on u tube found it by googlelin it, but no one had noticed that at some point on the video there can be seen something flying in front of the screen, at first i thought that it was an insect or something of that sort, but i started pausing the video on my iphone and there it was, undeniably an ufo, it seems to be leaving a trail of smoke, i moves in a fraction of a second and it is grey in color and looks like a spaceship. i think this video is worth looking into, when i get home tonight i'll try to rip the video frame by frame to catch the object in more detail, but am afraid that i won't have the right tools to do so. i'll enclose if possi le the link for the video and the details for you or someone to analyze . *(youtube information moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg). the ufo shows a fraction of a second before minute -104 as seen with my iphone . the video is from the archives of that town a think and i know fake from real, and i find hard to believe that someone could fake this particular video, specially when this ufo was not noticed and pointed out before. i know that you investigate recent events, that's wy i contacted you, please look into it if you can, it is definatelly worth it.
